original_text: Then Saul threw his spear at Jonathan and tried to kill him. So Jonathan knew that his father had decided to kill David.
korean_text: 사울이 요나단에게 단창을 던져 죽이려 한지라 요나단이 그의 아버지가 다윗을 죽이기로 결심한 줄 알고

sentences.original_text: Then Saul threw his spear at Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울이 자기 창을 요나단에게 던졌다

sentences.original_text: that his father had decided to kill David
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지가 다윗을 죽이기로 결정했다는 것을
